title: Georges Seurat A Sunday on La Grande Jatte Mug
description:
Mug developed from Georges Seurat’s A Sunday on La Grande Jatte—1884, 1884-86, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

A masterpiece from our collection can be enjoyed every day along with breakfast or afternoon tea! A great gift for a teacher or friend.

  • Size: 11oz.
  • Dimensions: 3.2 x 3.75 in.
  • Material: Ceramic
  • Dishwasher and microwave safe.
